name: The Night at Jurgjomkle's 2
description:
"Our protagonist Penny has been further tasked with keeping up her nightguard duties, now in a deeper (and much smaller) level of The Studio. And once again, her newest rival seems to have followed her..."

The Night at Jurgjomkle's 2 is a thrilling (?) sequel to TNAJ 1. (It's recommended to play it first.) It introduces new characters, new mechanics, and new stories. 

"Tnaj" -Ruby

"It's an experiencing experience!" -Moth
